title: Dragan Wende
overview: Dragan Wende has lived in Berlin since the '70s and has seen the city change through the years. His nephew comes to live with him as Dragan remembers the better days he lived as a Yugoslavian immigrant in a divided city.
storyline: Dragan Wende has lived in Berlin since the 70' and has seen the city change through the years. His nephew comes to live with him as Dragan remembers the better days he lived as a yugoslavian immigrant in a divided city.
